com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.checking.inline

Interface Marking

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Range
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MarkingImpl

    public interface Marking
extends Range
    The interface Marking is used for marking Flags in document. It is only used by InlineCheckCallback.mark(Marking). After InlineCheckCallback.onAfterMarking(com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.sessions.controller.inline.InlineCheckDocumentSessionController) only the getKey() is used. See Key

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Marking NULL
      The constant Null is a null object singleton.

      • NULL

        static final Marking NULL
        The constant Null is a null object singleton. It has a span from 0 to 0, Key.NULL and MarkingType.NULL.
